word_mean: 蛇：蛇亚目的无肢爬行动物，其中某些是毒蛇。另见viper

sentence.Network_cn: 蛇蜥其实不是蛇，而是无脚的蜥蜴。

sentence.Network_en: I haven'tthe faintest idea how to care for a snake.
The snake coiled up, ready to strike.
sentence.Network_cn: 那条蛇盘绕起来准备攻击。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English snaca, of Germanic origin

encyclopedia.content: 基本资料 日本动漫《魔术快斗》中的人物，神秘组织成员。 代号：斯内克（Snake），又译“毒蛇” 身份：神秘组织小头目 同伙：Spider（又译“蜘蛛”，真名为古纳·冯·高德伯格二世，世界著名幻术师） 上司：Boss 对手：黑羽盗一、黑羽快斗 声优：大冢芳忠（《魔术快斗》）、石井康嗣（《名侦探柯南》OVA） 简介：以寻找被称为“命运的宝石”——潘多拉为目的而抢夺宝石的神秘组织（不同于《名侦探柯南》中的黑衣组织），黑羽盗一

entry.def: A snake is a long, thin reptile without legs.
Something that snakes in a particular direction goes in that direction in a line with a lot of bends.

example.ex: The road snaked through forested mountains...
The three-mile procession snaked its way through the richest streets of the capital.
example.tran: 3 英里长的游行队伍弯弯曲曲地穿过了首都最繁华的街道。

means.word_mean: 1. limbless scaly elongate reptile; some are venomous
1. move smoothly and sinuously, like a snake

example.en: He should look happy. He's full of snake poison.
example.zh: 他应该是很开心的样子，他威士忌喝足了。

auth_sentence.content: Sweet maid...Thy sire and I will crush the snake!
auth_sentence.res_content: Sweet maid...Thy sire and I will crush the snake!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sweet maid...Thy sire and I will crush the snake!

auth_sentence.content: The hogs...scuffled over the snake, tore it apart.
auth_sentence.res_content: The hogs...scuffled over the snake, tore it apart.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The hogs...scuffled over the snake, tore it apart.

auth_sentence.content: This snake exhibits dramatic seasonal changes in skin colour.
auth_sentence.res_content: This snake exhibits dramatic seasonal changes in skin colour.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This snake exhibits dramatic seasonal changes in skin colour.

sentences.en: He was bitten by a poisonous snake.
That snake in the grass reported me to the teacher.
sentences.cn: 那个口蜜腹剑的家伙到老师那里告了我一状。

sentences.en: The timber was snaked to sawmills.
sentences.cn: 这些木材被拖到了锯木厂。

sentences.en: The train snaked its way among the mountains.
The river snakes through the valley.

sentences.cn: 一辆火车蜿蜒曲折驶进了视野。
一只蜈蚣飞快地爬开了

jushi.english: Mother and daughter were alike in their fear of snakes.
The place is full of insects, to say nothing of the snakes.
jushi.chinese: 这地方到处是虫子,更不用说蛇了。
